name: 3 Get posts from list
description:
Add list ID as seed node. 

You get the list ID from a list or a saved search/post at your CrowdTangle Dashboard (Preset 1) or you do a search with the search endpoint.

This preset fetches the last 10 posts on a page. To see more than 10 posts, set the count parameter up to 100. To see more than 100 posts increase the maximum pages. The API will max out at 10,000 posts. 

If you want to search special accounts from your list, you can add the account handles or platform ids to the account parameter. These can be separated by commas to include multiple accounts. 

The default sortBy Parameter for this preset is date. If you want to have other posts than the first 10 recently published posts, adjust the sortBy Parameter.

DON'T FORGET: Before you can fetch the data, you must enter your CrowdTangle access token in the corresponding field "access token" for authentication.

See https://github.com/CrowdTangle/API/wiki/Posts for more parameter options.

API-Cheatsheet: https://help.crowdtangle.com/en/articles/3443476-api-cheat-sheet
